attributes.action: Increase Financial Support for St Christophers Hospice
attributes.additional_details: Provide financial support for terminally ill people with their medical needs and support for the famillies of the patients.  St Christophers Hospice is a hospice which care for the dying and allow parents of the patients access to be with them with the time they have left. It also helps famillies get through depressing times during the process of the patients death.  We want the government to increase funding for St Christophers Hospice.
